newsitem.title: NIGERIA: At least three dead in Nigeria community clash.
newsitem.headline: At least three dead in Nigeria community clash.

text.p: At least three people were killed and over 60 hurt in weekend clashes between two southwest Nigerian communities over relocation of a local government headquarters, newspapers said on Monday.
The majority state-owned Daily Times put the death toll at three. Other newspapers said 10 people were feared dead in the fighting between villagers from Modakeke and Oke-Ogbo.
Local military authorities in Osun state have imposed a dusk-to-dawn curfew to prevent further violence, the papers said.
Scores of people have died in fighting this year in midwestern oil-producing areas between Ijaws and Itsekiris in clashes sparked by the relocation of another local government headquarters.
